actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the Secretary of the Senate to appear on behalf of the Senate as amicus curiae in certain cases challenging the constitutionality of the legislative veto.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Senate to appear on behalf of the Senate as amicus curiae in certain cases to defend the constitutionality of the legislative veto.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the Secretary of the Senate to appear on behalf of the Senate as amicus curiae in certain cases challenging the constitutionality of the legislative veto.
